Package org.frans.thesis.PhotoApp

Interface Summary
CFAutoRotatable This interface allows for interactive components to be automatically rotated.
CFAutoScalable This interface allows for interactive components to be automatically scaled.
 

Class Summary
CFAutoRotator A class that extends CFComponentModifier, so it is notified autmoatically when a interactive component on the tabletop has been moved by a user.
CFAutoScaler A class that extends CFComponentModifier, so it is notified autmoatically when a interactive component on the tabletop has been moved by a user.
CFImage CFImage represents an image on the tabletop that is usually transferred from a mobile device.
CFMobileDeviceProxy This class takes care of the visual representation of a connected client and a client-menu on the tabletop.
CFPhotoAlbum A class to represent a photo album on the tabletop.
CFPhotoApplication The main class to start the application.
CFPhotoScene The only scene in this application, which is also a tabletop service listener.
CFSpinner A class to show a simple spinner animation on the tabletop GUI.
CFTrashCan A class that represents a trashcan.
